comprehensive_overview: Sourmash is a command-line tool and Python library for comparing and analyzing nucleotide signatures from genomics data. It is specifically designed for estimating similarity between genomic datasets using MinHash sketches.
core_features: Estimation of Jaccard similarity between genomic datasets
MinHash-based sketching for fast and memory-efficient operations
Compatibility with various file formats including FASTQ, FASTA, and SRA
Support for creating and querying MinHash databases
Integration with other bioinformatics tools like Mash and Kraken
